name: Black and White and Red All Over
name_original: Black and White and Red All Over
description:
This is a game made for the 2021 1HP Moon Jam.
It is a Horror Puzzle game where you must solve the puzzles to escape, or die trying. Any mistake will kill you.

Here's what players are saying about our game:

“Ugh, these riddles are eating my ASS.”

“I really need to go to bed, but I also really want to solve this. I hate this and I hate you.”
